title: Activision Blizzard Acquires Candy Crush Maker King Digital Entertainment For $5.9 Billion
description: Well here’s a blockbuster acquisition for you. Gaming mothership Activision Blizzard has entered into an agreement to acquire King.com, maker of the wildly popular game Candy Crush and probably other games that I have nor ever will play. Mobile. Games. It’s all of the hot things. Read More
